payload.description:
A crowdsourced database of paranormal experiences that surfaces hidden patterns across stories through vector similarity clustering.

## Core Features
- Story submission with Google auth
- Hybrid search (BM25 + vector semantic)
- 2D visualization of story clusters
- Admin moderation queue

## Tech Stack
- Frontend: Next.js 14, Tailwind, D3/deck.gl
- Backend: Supabase (PostgreSQL + pgvector)
- APIs: AWS Bedrock (Titan Embeddings, Haiku)

## Phases
1. Foundation + Admin (auth, submission, moderation)
2. Search + Visualization (embeddings, hybrid search, UMAP map)
3. Clustering + Discovery (auto-clustering, AI labels)
4. Images + Polish (future)
payload.title: Paranormal Tracker MVP

payload.body: COMPLETE: Researched D3.js vs deck.gl for 10k+ point scatter plots. Recommendation: deck.gl for native WebGL performance (60 FPS with 1M+ points), built-in interactivity, and faster implementation. D3.js would require Canvas/WebGL integration. Findings documented in SPIKE-VIZ-LIBRARY.md.
